[Seal of Avarice]
The Seal of Avarice bestows the following benefits:
Ownership of the Necropolises: The Lords of Dawn have exclusive rights to the eight Necropolises. In case of a tie, entry is no longer exclusive.
Meeting with Lith: The door to the Forbidden Sanctum opens and we finally meet Lilith, the Abyssal Mother. She is our greatest enemy, sleeping in the Saints Necropolis.
Commerce with Merchant of Mammon: You can do business with the Merchant of Mammon in the Necropolises. They accept payment in ancient adena, and have many fine, rare articles.
"I wish to fight for the Seal of Avarice."
